Topic.Title: Copying games that i created possible? (Solved)

Posts.EditableText: Question: So, I've been working on this gamebook game on the side and I actually think it's turning out pretty good and I want to release a demo of it, but i don't want to have recreate everything I've already done with the game and I don't want to make the version I'm working on into the demo because again, that would require me to make a new version that would be the actual game but that would also require me to recreate the whole story and all the pages so is there a way i can create a copy of my game, (Btw the gamebook game is on the web editor so i can work on it where ever i have internet with needing to lug around my laptop) Answer: I solved my problem, and for anyone else who might have the same question, the answer is to complete the game as a demo and publish it with the name you want it to have and then you go back and edit the game and add "Demo" to the title and even tho it doesn't show up in the listing, when they enter the game "Demo" will appear in the title where ever you put it. Then all you need to do is complete the game and when it's done take "Demo" out of the name and publish it as an update and everything should work out perfectly FYI: The description isn't changeable after publishing as it only shows up in the listing, which doesn't change after the initial publishing of your game

Answer: I solved my problem, and for anyone else who might have the same question, the answer is to complete the game as a demo and publish it with the name you want it to have and then you go back and edit the game and add "Demo" to the title and even tho it doesn't show up in the listing, when they enter the game "Demo" will appear in the title where ever you put it. Then all you need to do is complete the game and when it's done take "Demo" out of the name and publish it as an update and everything should work out perfectly

Posts.EditableText: The description can be edited on the web site; it does not get updated from your game after the first upload.
